document_data.name: Hydra's Den
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hydra's Den''' was a busy pub that stood in the south-western part of [[Hillsfar]], not far from the [[Vault of Swords]], a local temple of [[Tempus]].
document_data.Services: The '''Hydra's Den''' offered several types of meals, catering to people of varied means. An average meal could cost up to 4 [[gold]] [[coin]]s. Among libations severed, the tavern offered pink [[lemonade]], [[beer]], [[wine]], and [[whiskey]].
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, the tavern was a crowded establishment swirling with gossip. The taproom had individual tables, booths, and seats at the bar.
